resources.string:
Thanks for using Towel Pie Root
By KrYpToNiTe!

 All the credit for the exploits go to Geohot and JCase not me, I only take credit for the app!

 Without them this app would not be possible. It combines Towelroot's futex exploit with a modified version of PIE root's xbin.img mount into one app. To achieve a one click untethered root for write protected devices!

 If you enjoyed this, please donate to Geohot at towelroot.com, and JCase at jcase@cunninglogic.com!
